title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - VDGS module - version 2.1.0
description:
In this video we will have a look at the VDGS module which will bring the signs at the gates to live. Currently the functionality works with both the community editions from Bergen and Stavanger airport which you can download via flightsim.to.

If you want to try the addons yourself download them via the link below:

VDGS module:
https://fs.nool.ee/MSFS/VDGS/Releases/

Bergen airport:
https://flightsim.to/file/1946/enbr-bergen-airport-flesland

Stavanger airport:
https://flightsim.to/file/1494/enzv-stavanger-airport-sola
